message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it holds, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1080000.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value is worth more than what you're offering. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1300000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1250000.

I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.
